2.title: Kirstie & Joe
2.plot: On LOVE CONNECTION, hosted by Andy Cohen, two singles will be sent on three blind dates each, with the hope of finding a love connection. They will then tell all in front of a live studio audience, as their dates also react. Unlike Season One, the primary dater doesn't have to choose between money or love...but if the audience correctly predicts who made a love connection, the dater wins $10,000!

6.title: Spencer & Tracy
6.plot: On LOVE CONNECTION, hosted by Andy Cohen, two singles will be sent on three blind dates each, with the hope of finding a love connection. They will then tell all in front of a live studio audience, as their dates also react. Will Spencer Gospe, a civil engineer, and Tracy Nibo, a therapist, both from Los Angeles, find love -- Will they choose the same love connections that the audience chose for them and win $10,000.

7.title: Aaron & Macconie
7.plot: On LOVE CONNECTION, hosted by Andy Cohen, two singles will be sent on three blind dates each, with the hope of finding a love connection. They will then tell all in front of a live studio audience, as their dates also react. In this episode, Aaron Bridgers, a fitness consultant from Chicago, and Maconnie Dukuly, a hairdresser from Los Angeles, hope to make love connections. Unlike Season One, the primary dater doesn't have to choose between money or love...but if the audience correctly predicts who made a love connection, the dater wins $10,000!

8.title: Tiffany & Ahmed
8.plot: On LOVE CONNECTION, hosted by Andy Cohen, two singles will be sent on three blind dates each, with the hope of finding a love connection. They will then tell all in front of a live studio audience, as their dates also react. In this episode, Tiffany Venticinque, a dominatrix from Long Island, NY and Ahmed Al-Kadri, an accountant from Dallas, TX hope to make love connections. Unlike Season One, the primary dater doesn't have to choose between money or love...but if the audience correctly predicts who made a love connection, the dater wins $10,000!

1.title: Don't Go Bacon My Heart
1.plot: Andy Cohen hosts the all-new revival of the classic unscripted series LOVE CONNECTION. The one-hour series amps up the original hit dating show for today's audiences. Each hour of LOVE CONNECTION will feature single men and/or women in search of romance. After the singles are sent on three blind dates, they will dish the dirt in front of a live studio audience, as Cohen brings his personal brand of audacious fun to the series.

15.title: Secret Billionaire
15.plot: This week's Single is billionaire Sergio Rizzuto, whose family's immense wealth is kept a secret from his dates - a store manager, a content creator and a manager of a charity - until it's revealed to them on the show. Also featured is Single Jessica-Lee Korkes, a driver and waitress, who dates a P.E. teacher, a bartender and a business analyst in her search for a love connection.

imdb.title: Love Connection
plot: Emmy Award winner Andy Cohen will host _Love Connection_ (qv), a new one-hour series that amps up the original hit dating show for today's audiences.
